text: Tokyo Decadence is a Japanese erotic 1991 pink movie. The movie is about four sex sequences. ==Plot== A timid Japanese college student works as a specialty prostitute. She does this for an exclusive escort agency that caters to wealthy Japanese men in Tokyo. To please her clients, she plays out elaborate fantasy scenarios with sadomasochism and bondage. ==Controversy== This movie has been banned or refused classification in South Korea and Australia. It is rated NC-17 for sadomasochistic sex content. ==References== Category:1990s erotic movies Category:1991 drama movies Category:NC-17 rated movies Category:Obscenity Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Movies about necrophilia Category:Movies about prostitution
title: Tokyo Decadence
